alert.note: Alert for Quitman; Tallahatchie (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 24 at 7:45PM CDT until March 24 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Tallahatchie County in northwestern Mississippi... Southeastern Quitman County in northwestern Mississippi... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 744 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Ruleville, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Charleston, Webb, Sumner, Paynes, Glendora, Distall, Swan Lake, Mikoma, Tippo, Stover, Leverett, Waverly, Whitehead, Brazil, Albin and Effie. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a storm shelter or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
